value:
Mmm, fish and wheat...no soybeans...
Huh? Oh dear. It seems my hungry
stomach had me sleep talking again.

Being able to converse with Corrin
again in this form... Why, it's almost
like a dream. I'm eternally grateful.

I have fond memories of Corrin gently
petting my head or carrying me in my
dragon form. I'll always remember it.

The Kingdom of Askr feels familiar.
The atmosphere is reminiscent of a
certain country I once knew...

Please allow me to tend the stables.
My strong kinship with horses would
be useful to the Order of Heroes.

Hello. I'm Lilith. I've arrived at the
behest of $Nf.
Now I can be helpful to everyone!
I feel more powerful now!

I wonder if this land can make me
strong enough to protect everyone.

I'd like to offer thanks. I'll never
forget my debt to you.

Hello, I'm Lilith. I faithfully served at
Corrin's side in the Kingdom of Nohr.
Now I'm here if you need my aid.

If you will, I have something to ask.
Do you have someone you'd be
willing to sacrifice your life for?$k$pI'll confess I'm not fit for combat and
I certainly don't wish for wars that
cause tragedy and heartache.$k$pBut in order to prove my devotion,
I'm willing to risk everything in battle
with no regrets.$k$pMy resolve is why I stand before you.
Or could it possibly be due to the
strength I get from those feelings?$k$pI'm positive all of the Heroes carry
similar sentiments. Let's make a pact
to always protect those dear to us.
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
Why... ?
Not likely!
How foolish.
Moro, I beseech you!
Dragons, grant me strength!
I'm...sorry...
*giggle*
My name is Lilith. I was Corrin's faithful attendant.
Hey! Please, try not to sneak up on me!
Since meeting Corrin, I never feel alone anymore.
I'll perform whatever duties you ask, but...as a stable girl, I'm good at caring for horses!
A dragon of starlight, a guide for travelers... That's me!
Corrin... Even though I can't tell you the truth, I will always protect you...
You, too, are precious to me... Whatever you need, I am at your service.
Anything you ask.
Right, then.
Certainly!
